function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decentralized water and wastewater treatment without proper simulation and control measures can lead to the spread of waterborne diseases, including learning.","People":"Consumers relying on the treated water supply.","Owner":"Water and wastewater treatment plant operators."},{"Description":"Lack of early detection of emerging pollutants in the plant operators, environmental regulatory agencies."}]}
